0xBA352ADD.name: GET_PED_FACE_FEATURE
0xBA352ADD.description: A getter for [\_SET_PED_FACE_FEATURE](#\_0x71A5C1DBA060049E). Returns 0.0 if fails to get.

examples.code:
local noseWidth = GetPedFaceFeature(PlayerPedId(), 0)
if noseWidth == 1.0 then
  print("You have big nose!")
end

0xBA352ADD.resultsDescription: Returns ped's face feature value, or 0.0 if fails to get.
